name: denier
content:
denier noun [C]
(PERSON)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who says that something did not happen or that a situation does not exist, especially something that most people agree did happen or does exist: climate change denier He has compared climate change deniers to people who denied the link between HIV and Aids.Holocaust denier There are plenty of Holocaust deniers out there.
